data.source_sensor: Select the Home Assistant sensor entity that measures the weight of your litter box. This is typically a sensor created by your scale integration.
data.cat_weight_threshold: Set the minimum weight (in grams) that will be considered as a cat entering the litter box. This helps to ignore small changes caused by other factors.
data.min_presence_time: Specify the minimum amount of time (in seconds) the detected weight must remain above the threshold to count as a cat visit. This helps to filter out brief disturbances.
data.leave_timeout: Set the time (in seconds) to wait after the cat leaves before considering the visit finished. This helps to avoid false detections if the cat returns quickly.
data.after_cat_standard_deviation: Set the standard deviation threshold used to determine when the litter box weight has stabilized after a cat visit. Lower values make detection more sensitive to small changes.
